subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Mike Edwards Files/Spirit said my first name and last name.wav 
  Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
  Description : I turned on the Ghost Box 12-469 on AM Band suggested by Rhonda. Thanks Rhonda!! And a spirit called out my first and last name!!! 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/Spirit%20said%20my%20first%20name%20and%20last%20name.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>
